data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Daniela A., Mainenti, Adriana, Knoff, Marcelo, Gomes, Delir Correa (2017): Type material of Platyhelminthes housed in the Helminthological Collection of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute / FIOCRUZ (CHIOC), Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, from 1979 to 2016 (Rhabditophora, Trematoda and Cestoda). ZooKeys 662: 1-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.662.11685, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.662.11685
